title: This trial struck down California's same-sex marriage ban. Now you can see the tapes
description: More than a decade after the trial to overturn Prop. 8 ended, trial videotapes remained sealed, until NPR member station KQED won a long legal battle that got the U.S. Supreme Court to unseal them.

title: Lessons from brain science — and history's peacemakers — for resolving conflicts
description: Humans instinctually forge loyalties to groups to survive. Being aware of these impulses can help us deescalate arguments and find common ground. Some notable leaders in history show us how it's done.
